text:
April 10, 2018 / 2:18 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Clearpool Group & BMO Capital Markets Announce Strategic Technology Partnership Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Clearpool: 
* CLEARPOOL GROUP AND BMO CAPITAL MARKETS ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC TECHNOLOGY PARTNERSHIP 
* BMO TO HAVE ACCESS TO COâ€™S SMART ORDER ROUTER, PROVIDING CROSS-BORDER ACCESS TO US AND CANADIAN EQUITY MARKETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
